messages.subject: Bridge of Dreams book sale extended
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to all of you who took the opportunity to expand their libraries. As the saying goes, good reference books don t cost, they pay. I ve decided to extend
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to all of you who took the opportunity to expand their
libraries. As the saying goes, good reference books don't cost, they
pay.

I've decided to extend my sale through next Wednesday. I was out of
town on three separate short trips last week to tour universities with
my son, and did not get nearly as much new material uploaded as I had
planned to. Once again, it's a 33% discount on all sales of books from
my website, shipping at cost.

I will be adding newly found books to the website, and continuing to
pack up for the Chicago Show, where I will offer a slightly less
attractive discount since as an Illinois business making sales in
Illinois I have to deal with a 10% sales tax.

As long as you are comfortable with orders placed near the end of the
sale waiting until after the show to ship, order away!

I'm very pleased with the results, and I'm glad to have made the
acquaintance of many of you whom I did not know before.

Craig

http://www.bridgeofdreams.com

--
Craig Harris
Bridge of Dreams, LLC
Books from and about Asia
www.bridgeofdreams.com
